attributes.title: get this off...horrible app
attributes.review: this app has so many problems i don’t even know where to start. for starters i took forever to download and after it fiiiiiiinally did it was late at night. i was just trying to keep track of the campaign. secondly it kept glitching out and next thing i knew my phone had shut off. when i was able to get my phone back on my lock screen had changed to a picture of a stupid orange man with horse teeth. this was extremely frightening to me and my child. i wasn’t able to change it until i uninstalled the trash app.  i don’t recommend download don’t waste your time.

attributes.title: 🧚🏻‍♂️✨Horrible App✨🧚‍♀️
attributes.review: If I could give a negative star I would. As soon as I downloaded this my Fridge walked out the door???? My dog also stopped mowing the lawn and looked at me very strangely??? Not only that but I also saw a a horrible moldy Cheeto it was just 🤮 PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE fix the app so that it no longer is about this topic it could literally be about anything else and it would have better reviews than this 😌✌️

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app is horrible. Where do I even start... they ask for my phone number and they keep spamming me to donate money. I don’t want to donate any money this is pretty much harassment. Why does Cheeto boy even need money he’s literally a billionaire. This app was also so complicated to use and I keep seeing pictures of Cheeto/bunker boy plastered all over the app, it’s kinda narcissistic don’t you think?

attributes.title: 💊💊Tic Tacs 💊💊
attributes.review: Once upon a time I was downloading this app and then I fell asleep. 😴🙈 ✨100✨years later my Prince Charming of a Cheeto Puff 🦐 came to wake me up, but when I woke up I saw that the app was still downloading 👿😒 so I went back to sleep and then 200 years later I’m still sitting in my grave and the app finally downloaded. But when I tried to open it up, it was a blue screen and it said “Vote Blue” 😌 🦟🦗🦟🦗🦟🦗🦟

attributes.title: would not recommend 😖🙅‍♂️
attributes.review: I got this app so I could keep up with my king🥰, my hero🤩 and my favorite racist, Donald Trump🤢. I was having a lovely day until I opened the app. The first thing I saw was a terrifying 🙈😖🤢👎😳the photo of him, god it made me to poor bleach in my eyes🤧. The app is just as horrible as the photo. they wanted EVERYTHING🤧. I felt VERY VERY uncomfortable😣 and VIOLATED😡 while using this app😤😠. I suggest no one get it🙅‍♂️🙅‍♂️ have a nice day❤️

attributes.title: Don't download!! Secret data collection service for the chinese
attributes.review: The trump 2020 app seemed to be a harmless way for me to keep up to date with politics. Upon opening the app it asks for a phone number, I gladly accepted expecting semi-frequent updates on the campaign through texts, instead, my data was sold to numerous chinese companies and I get countless scam offers a day on chinese products. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP IF YOU DONT WANT YOUR DATA STOLEN

attributes.title: DON’T GET APP!! CURSED 😨❗️❗️❗️
attributes.review: I got this app a week ago, and it was terrible.  The app asks for my number so I give them it blah blah blah. They give me a link saying they’ll give me free merch so I click it, a website pops up and it gave me a virus. Not a computer virus, a real virus. I immediately needed to use the restroom, and a minute after, I had explosive diarrhea. Like, my toilet broke it was so explosive. It was Trump who did it, he is a witch!! Get the word out, please!!!!

attributes.title: Offensive and disgusting
attributes.review: the cheeto man really dropped the ball when it came to this app. the photos of him made me feel uncomfortable and unsafe. the horribly worded statements he has made does not make me feel secure to be living under his authority. the things his has said about women absolutely does not make me proud to be an american and i do not want to live to see the day where he serves another term as president.

attributes.title: Hahaha. No. 👁👄👁
attributes.review: So I wanted to see when the next rally was because I wanted to buy ticket fire my great aunt. When I first opened the app I saw Cheetos 🤏🏻🍆. And man that thing was 🤏🏻 and ⚠️. So after I closed the app. My eyes felt really fuzzy so I rubbed them. And when I opened them again. I was blind!  I’m now using the microphone to type this. But I’m going to sue Cheetos 🤏🏻🍆 for making me go blind!! ✨🧚🏻Trump 2020🧚🏻💞 Make it on a gravestone✨💞🧚🏻

attributes.title: HAHA 😔🤢🤮🤬
attributes.review: I wish i can give this a 0 but i cant but pls dont download this its very disturbing and theres a lot of people in this app that say really disturbing stuff like trump 2020 so i recommend you not dowloading it because when i first saw the app it showed me some balls of an orange and if you dont want to see that dont download it cause its full of balls and people saying trump 2020 and that’s really disgusting and disturbing
